availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Oliver P. Herndon (Clear Creek, Kentucky, farmer and physician)

body.p: Clear Creek, Kentucky, farmer and physician. Kentucky native. Son of Benjamin F. Herndon and Theodosia Renfro Herndon. Married Keziah Vance Herndon in Washington County, Tennessee, on March 2, 1846. Father of Richardson Herndon, William Herndon, James Herndon, Benjamin Herndon, Jane Herndon, Thomas Herndon, Caroline Herndon, and Alexandra Herndon. Farmer in Harlan County in 1850. Physician in Clear Creek in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harlan County, District 1, p. 41B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Knox County, Clear Creek, p. 153.
